channel.title: [Delta] Adding Custom Crowns?
channel.description:
So I followed a tutorial on how to add custom crowns to a new rank (in this case i want different crowns for different levels of donators) and i successfully added the crown on the client side, but now how do i actually get the crown to show up next to the players name? I can't find out where it says the part that will give say a mod a crown, like basically the part that translates to "if playerRights == 1 give them a crown. (I know it's not that simple)
Where can i add this code? i'm sure if i can find where it is for a mod, i can figure out how to make one for a donator.

item.title: [Delta] Adding Custom Crowns?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

client.java then or wherever you can find your commands. I think it might be source-sided to add the command? or try this guide http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/336827-pi-adding-crowns-player-rights.html

Read full topic
